issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Move `expressions` and `inputs` into LogicalPlan rather than helpers in util
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11709](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11709). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

 move `expressions` and `inputs` into LogicalPlan rather than helpers in util, and use Visitor rather than hard coded list

Goal is to consolidate the expression walking in one place

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11709?focusedCommentId=17291936) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9568
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9568>
